text:
1095 2023 Update Step By Step

(Team Lead & Tier 2 Only)

(These Are Only For Consumers' Who Coverage Is Through Full Plan Year.
12/31/23)

  

Step 1: CSR Should Have Already Updated 2023 Application.ï¿¼

Step 2: Go To Applicaitons (CSR View) ---> Select 2023 App Year ---> Actions

Step 3: Select "Change Coverage Start Date

Step 4: Specify The Reason For Override

Step 5: Change Start Date To 12/1/2023

Step 6: Go Back To Consumer Dashboard

Step 7: Finalize The Consumer Plan

  

Once Finished Please Go To Consumer 2023 Enrollment additional
